channel.title: Skill Errors/Problems
channel.description:
I recently added a few skills and i get this when i try and smelt ores. (completely crashes the client)
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method119(client.java:10798) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9617) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10465) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] [hr] when i fletch i get no errors it just logs out. [hr] And fishing does not work at all, characters do not even start fishing.
Any ideas on how to fix these?

post this

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:3, topic:524735”]the first 2 may be caused by bad coding

fishing in some servers the person doesnt have the fishing animation thus have to wait and think he doesnt fish.

i would just rewrite all skills.[/quote]

item.title: Skill Errors/Problems
item.dc:creator: @Amuse1 Amuse_
item.description:
@Amuse1 wrote:

I recently added a few skills and i get this when i try and smelt ores. (completely crashes the client)

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method119(client.java:10798) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9617) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10465) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6027) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[hr]
when i fletch i get no errors it just logs out.
[hr]
And fishing does not work at all, characters do not even start fishing.

Any ideas on how to fix these?
